Name: Empowered by Madness
Description: Chance to gain Madness when your turn ends. Madness grants you bonuses and full control over your actions.

Name: King's Defense
Description: When disabled (Knocked Down, Stunned, etc) incoming damage is reduced by a percentage.

Name: Immunity Boost
Description: When your turn ends, harmful damage-over-time statuses are cleansed, restoring a percentage of vitality per status removed.

Name: Cursed Fire
Description: Damaging fire spells have a chance to apply Necrofire.

Name: Shocking Rain
Description: Rain creates a mild lightning storm at the target location.

Name: Defensive Start
Description: Start combat with Fortified and Magic Shell.
